short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See the Food Hygiene Rating on Deliveroo's menu pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Spend less time on the loo and more time enjoying the amazing variety of cuisines available on Deliveroo.

This extension checks the Food Standards Agency's ratings (Food Hygiene Information Scheme in Scotland) on Deliveroo so you know what to expect when ordering.

Current features:
* Displays Food Hygiene Ratings for English and Welsh restaurants/establishments (in English)

* Displays the Food Hygiene Information Scheme certificates for Scottish restaurants/establishments

* When you click the rating image you will be taken to the full result page on FSA's website for more information

=======

Fast and super tiny extension that only accesses your browser when you are on a Deliveroo menu page and doesn't require all manner of permissions. Check out the public Github repo here: https://github.com/krisztin/foodpoison-chrome
